channel.title: Comments on: Sparta as reflective of the era?
channel.description: notes on Jewish theology and spirituality

item.title: By: amitgvaryahu
item.dc:creator: amitgvaryahu
item.description: The translation is by Prof. Dwora Gilula, who is translating what she likes - she did all of Aristophanes, and some forensic speeches, and now she's doing this. I'm not sure it says much more.
item.content:encoded: The translation is by Prof. Dwora Gilula, who is translating what she likes – she did all of Aristophanes, and some forensic speeches, and now she’s doing this. I’m not sure it says much more.
